Package openbook.domain

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • openbook.domain.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @Entity
public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An immutable persistent entity represents a Book.
    The mutable properties of the book such as number of items in stock etc. are factored out in a separate     Inventory instance.
    The state of inventory is mutable, but the relation to inventory is immutable.
  • Identity: Application-defined identity.
  • Mapping: One-to-One bi-directional, immutable mapping to Inventory. Many-to-Many bi-directional mapping to Author.
  • Version: No.

Author:
Pinaki Poddar
See Also:
